mapper.insert: insert into task_t( type, sub_type, task_key, req_param, res_param, fail_cnt, chance_cnt, created_by, creation_date, last_update_by, last_update_date )values( #{fo.type}, #{fo.subType}, #{fo.taskKey}, #{fo.reqParam}, #{fo.resParam}, #{fo.failCnt}, #{fo.chanceCnt}, #{fo.createdBy}, now(), #{fo.lastUpdateBy}, now() )
